inclusion.criterion: MRI changes consistent with a diagnosis of FCD type II a or b
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History of at least two epileptic seizures in the past 6 months before randomisation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Seizure semiology consistent with focal onset, agreed after pre-surgical discussion to be surgically treatable
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Parent/ legal representative willing to give consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Not a surgical candidate for FCD resection
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Administration of the KD is medically contraindicated
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41 year old man with history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
